column3: utACK 394fc4d\n\nLooks like the last full run on a FreeBSD VM (of master) completed successfully.
I had to exclude feature_dbcrash, but at least we are running feature_pruning on freebsd now and the build is faster. Going to merge this.

If you are hitting the time out limit but your build can benefit from more CPUs, you can try to increase VM resources to the maximum allowed:

```yaml
freebsd_instance:
    image: freebsd-12-0-release-amd64
    cpu: 8
    memory: 24G
```
